Description: Specifies whether the model may use underground storage to sequester captured CO2 or not.

Specifies whether the model may transport captured CO2 between nodes or not. In case transportation is specified, a network of CO2 pipelines is built based on the costs, discount rate, as well as the lifetime stipulated in this subsection.
Enable (``true``) or disable (``false``) the capability to transport captured CO2 between nodes.
Capital cost of building one mile long CO2 pipeline.
Marginal cost of transporting one tonne of captured CO2.
Discount rate of the capital cost of building a network of CO2 pipelines.
